short_summary: Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction and Repairs in Codroy NL
description: PHASE 2 - BY INVITATION ONLY - Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction and Repairs in Codroy NL
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify: Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction and Repairs

**Solicitation Overview:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit a qualification and experience package for the Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction and Repairs project in Codroy, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Project Overview:**

The project involves reconstruction and repairs of storm damage caused by Fiona in Codroy, Newfoundland and Labrador. PWGSC is seeking a contractor with expertise in heavy construction services, including dredging.

**Tender Details:**
